subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Sharapova lost to 13th-seeded Lucie Safarova of the Czech Republic in the fourth round. Williams needed three sets to defeat Sloane Stephens.
snippet: Sharapova lost to 13th-seeded Lucie Safarova of the Czech Republic in the fourth round. Williams needed three sets to defeat Sloane Stephens.
